page.title: 13The Chinese Garage,Beckenham
page.content: {Kelsey Park}is the site of a recreation area,and a school of the same name. There is also one parade of shops in Wickham Road which deal with the needs of local people.The busiest shops are the newsagents/Post Office and a small Supermarket. Next to the entrance to the park is the Chinese Roundabout,so called because of the pagoda design of the garage on the roundabout.This building is quite famous and is listed in a book on architecture.The roundabout is always very busy because it carries traffic between Bromley and Croydon.
